remarks: Deduction version of ~ findcard2 .  (Contributed by SO, 16-Jul-2018.)
statement:
findcard2d.ch $e |- ( x = (/) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
findcard2d.th $e |- ( x = y -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
findcard2d.ta $e |- ( x = ( y u. { z } ) -> ( ps <-> ta ) ) $.
findcard2d.et $e |- ( x = A -> ( ps <-> et ) ) $.
findcard2d.z $e |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
findcard2d.i $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( y C_ A /\ z e. ( A \ y ) ) ) -> ( th -> ta ) ) $.
findcard2d.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
findcard2d $p |- ( ph -> et ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d ch x $.
$d et x $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d ps y z $.
$d ta x $.
$d th x $.
